#include <iostream>
#include <bitset>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
void binary(int num)

{

	int rem;

	if (num <= 1)

	{

		cout << num;

		return;

	}

	rem = num % 2;

	binary(num / 2);

	cout << rem;

}
int main() {
	long t, n, i, a, j;
	cin >> t;

	while (t--) {
		cin >> n;

		for (i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
			cin >> a;
			for (j = 1; j <= a; j++) {

				binary(j);
				cout << " ";

			}
		}
		cout << endl;
	}
}
